sentences.sContent: Those boys rifled the peach trees in our garden.
sentences.sCn: 那些男孩子把我们花园里的桃树抢摘光了。

sentences.sContent: There are a few apple trees scattered among these peach trees.
sentences.sCn: 这片桃树中杂有几棵苹果树。

synos.tran: 桃子；[园艺]桃树；桃红色；受人喜欢的人（或物）

words.tran: 桃色的；桃子似的；出色的

trans.tranOther: a round juicy fruit that has a soft yellow or red skin and a large, hard seed in the centre, or the tree that this fruit grows on
